page.title: 09ROYAL ASCOT PROCESSION
page.content: During Ascot Week the Queen and other members of the Royal Family ride down,every day,from Windsor Castle through Windsor Great Park to Ascot Race Course in open topped,horse drawn carriages. First came the butlers and maids,then after five minutes we saw the Royal Procession.At its head was the Queen and Prince Philip,closely followed by the Queen Mother,Princess Diana and Prince Charles.In the next carriage came the Duke and Duchess of Kent and Princess Margaret. It took two minutes for the Procession to pass as they carried on their way to the Race Course.
